DOC.detailed_description: Mindfulness meditation practice widely use among general public , people seek reduce stress , pain , inflammation , depression , disease symptom . Moreover , randomize control trial show mindfulness training program effective improve broad range psychological physical health outcome , particularly among population high stress burden . Still , little known mechanism underlie mindfulness train drive effect . This study test active component mindfulness impact stress respond health biomarkers . The study separate attention acceptance mindfulness instruction three 14-day train program deliver stress adult population : ( 1 ) attention acceptance instruction , ( 2 ) attentional monitoring instruction , ( 3 ) analytic thinking mindfulness instruction . Intervention program deliver participant ' smartphones , provide platform maximal experimental control test active ingredient mindfulness training . Participants recruit Pittsburgh community . At baseline laboratory session , complete psychosocial questionnaire task provide dry blood spot sample . On , complete pre- post-intervention Ecological Momentary Assessment measure stress , attention , acceptance daily life . Between assessment , participant 14 day complete randomly assign 14-lesson intervention program . Participants return lab post-intervention assessment ( questionnaire , task , dry blood sample ) , listen final training session intervention program , complete Trier Social Stress Test .
